ComicInfo.Title: Malice in Wonderland
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:36:26. [Issue ID 4992]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Summary:
Shi Tuan and his soldiers capture a hospital and cremate wounded soldiers.
Glory's dad is taken in by a woman and her talking horse.
The professor has to deal with a cursed lamp.
Some kids find a cabin with skeletons and gold.
Kazanda tries to revive Sylf from his death-like state.
Bob is near death in Burma when a ceremony gives him the lifeforce of a tiger.
ComicInfo.Writer: R. W. Colt,Bob Hickok,Armond Broussard,Peter Amos,Eric Marlin
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Lubbers,Joey Cavallo,Lily Renée,Lee Elias,Brodie Mack,Rodlow Willard
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Lubbers,Joey Cavallo,Lily Renée,Lee Elias,Brodie Mack,Rodlow Willard
